fairies should get an "bewitch" attack, or something, wherein an 
enemy becomes all confused like and attacks everyone.

also, fairies should get some attack (no ideas for name), where they 
can vanish from view in good fairie tradition, but only to one or two 
enemies, not that i know how that would work or if it would at all.

Oldschool
